item.title: Relationships
item.summary: Bushman terms for various degrees of relationship. Given by /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-31. 8788-8790, 32. 8792 and 8793, 8845-8847). Terms for various relationships by marriage. (L VIII.-12. 7067 rev. and 7068 rev., 32. 8794 rev.). Some of these terms seem to be spoken by men or women and apply to relations of different genders and ages.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-32
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: terms used by men or women
terms used for relations of different genders and ages
used for relations of different genders and ages
